# DARWHIN GOMEZ

**New York, New York**  
**Darwhin88@gmail.com**  |  **929-305-7353**  |  **[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)**  |  **[GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)**

---

## SUMMARY
Solutions-focused technologist with expertise in cloud architecture and data automation, driving efficiency and scalability.

## CORE SKILLS
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, Glue, QuickSight, Bedrock, SageMaker), Azure (App Service, Functions)
- **Data & ML:** Python, SQL, NoSQL, Generative AI, ETL/ELT
- **Automation:** CI/CD, Docker, Agile/Scrum
- **Security:** SIEM, Active Directory, Linux

## EXPERIENCE

### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)**, Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
*Jun 2025 – Sep 2025*  
- Designed secure, scalable AWS architectures for enterprise clients, enhancing reliability and compliance.  
- Built automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records, achieving 5x faster feedback loops.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.  

### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies**, Remote, NY  
*Jun 2024 – Sep 2024*  
- Configured Azure environments for application hosting, ensuring compliance with governance policies.  
- Developed data flow diagrams, enhancing clarity in architecture design.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**, New York, NY  
*Feb 2024 – May 2024*  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows with Python, reducing manual workload significantly.  
- Supported VIP users, ensuring secure access via Active Directory and VPN.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA**, Remote, NY  
*Feb 2022 – Aug 2023*  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, achieving a 96% cohort graduation rate through data-driven instruction.

## EDUCATION
**Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning**  
City University of New York, Expected Jan 2026, GPA 4.0  

**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York, Jun 2024, GPA 3.78  
Dean’s List (8x), National Honor Society  

## CERTIFICATIONS
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  

## PROJECTS
### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Developed a job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1, reducing application time by 60%.  
- Integrated job board APIs, increasing completed applications by 300% weekly.  

## PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITIES
